name: 30 Minutes Chilli
cookingSteps: Cook beef and onions in large saucepan over medium-high heat 5-10 minutes or until beef is crumbled, cooked through, and no longer pink. Stir occasionally; drain.
Stir in seasoning mix. Add remaining ingredients (excluding cheese); bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium; simmer 10 minutes, stirring several times.
Serve hot topped with the cheese and enjoy!
